PII Filter Test File
====================

=== SHOULD BE REDACTED ===

# Email Addresses
Email: john.smith@company.com
Secondary Email: j.smith@personal.email.com

# Phone Numbers (various formats)
US Phone: (555) 123-4567
US Phone Alt: 555.987.6543
UK Phone: +44 20 7946 0958

# National ID / SSN (US format: XXX-XX-XXXX)
Social Security Number: 123-45-6789

# Credit Cards (Luhn-valid test numbers)
Visa: 4532 0151 1283 0366
MasterCard: 5555 5555 5555 4444

# IP Addresses
Home IP: 192.168.1.100
Work IP: 10.0.0.50
Public IP: 203.0.113.42


=== SHOULD NOT BE REDACTED ===

# Plain names (no pattern detection for names)
Name: John Smith

# Partial/invalid formats that don't match patterns
Incomplete phone: 555-12
Too short for SSN: 12-34-567
Invalid credit card: 1234 5678 9012 3456 (fails Luhn check)


=== KNOWN FALSE POSITIVES (Will be redacted even though not PII) ===

# These match PII patterns but aren't actually sensitive
# Ticket number matches SSN pattern - WILL be redacted as SSN
The ticket number is 987-65-4321 in our system.

# Reference code matches phone pattern - WILL be redacted as phone
Reference code: 555.111.2222
